verses.html:
1
Thank the Father, He’s the only God,
He redeems me from all my sins.
O dear Lord, my Spirit renew!
O praise His name,
Thank Him for His great love.

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
Sing to the Lord, sing joyfully, Sing!
Sing of His love, sing joyfully, Sing!
Hallelujah, Hallelujah!

2
Thank the Father, He’s the Only God,
Who fulfils the needs of my soul.
O dear Lord, send Thy manna to me!
O praise His name,
Thank Him for His great love.

verses.label: 2C
verses.html:
2
Sing to the Lord, sing joyfully, Sing!
Sing of His love, sing joyfully, Sing!
Hallelujah, Hallelujah!
